What Our Clients Have To Say

Everyone has a smile on their faces and always greet people with a kind heart. The 5 day summer Playschool is a great experience for my Aebriel. She really enjoyed, learned and gained new friends! That’s why we registered again for the month of September. See you again on September!

Joanna Mae Briones-Alcantara

Mother of Aebriel

I am grateful and blessed to this school and to Teacher Sharon, I enrolled my daugther on their summer reading program (A 10 days class – 5 days online & 5 days face to face) i expect that it would be pure reading program but they also help my child to improve her writing skills. I can’t believe that my little cassey can read now.❤️

Larissa Rosales Dimailig

Mother of Cassey

Maganda yung school 😍 Malinis and maganda facilities, all around. Even the waiting area super nice. Mag eenjoy ang kids at the same time matututo talaga sila. Super mabait lahat ang teachers and staffs even the School Director napaka bait nya❤️ Planning to enroll my son in his nursery level soon. Thankyou so much FRONTLINE FAM. ✨

Krizzle Ann O. Bacsa

House wife, Businesswoman
Mother of Popoy

Apply for a Scholarship

FCA's scholarship programs provide funding for qualified students. There are two programs: the Academic Scholarship and the Indigent Scholarship. Message us or visit us to find out more.
